settings.question: Where do you ship to?
settings.answer:
We may be on a island, far from anything - but we ship worldwide! Most addresses are deliverable through our postage partners. If we ever have an issue with organising shipping, we will contact you - and if we are unable to send, we will refund your order in full.

Please note international shipping may incur duties and taxes applied by customs in the country of delivery. These charges are the responsibility of the buyer.

settings.question: How long does shipping take?
settings.answer:
Orders tend to be dispatched the next business day, and then sent to you within the timeframe depending on the service you have selected.

If you have urgency to receiving your order, we highly recommend choosing an Express Shipping option at checkout.

Please note: our T-Shirts are located in a separate facility and will be dispatched within 3-7 days of ordering. From this time frame, the below postage time frames apply.

Australia Standard: 2-5 Business Days
Australia Express: 1-2 Business Days

New Zealand Standard: 1-2 Weeks
New Zealand Express: 4-8 Business Day

United States Standard: 2-3 Weeks
United States Express: 6-10 Business Days

Canada Standard: 2-3 Weeks
Canada Express: 6-10 Business Days

UK & Ireland Standard: 2-3 Weeks
UK & Ireland Express: 5-9 Business Days

Asia Standard: 2-3 Weeks
Asia Express: 6-10 Business Days

Europe Standard: 2-4 Weeks
Europe Express: 8-12 Business Days

Pacific Islands Standard: 3-5 Weeks
Pacific Island Express: 8-12 Business Days

settings.question: How much does shipping cost?
settings.answer:
We have different pricing depending on the shipping service youâ€™ve selected, your location, and your total purchase value. All shipping costs are estimated in the checkout before you commit to purchase.

Within Australia, New Zealand, United States, Canada, and the United Kingdom/Ireland, we offer free Standard Shipping for over all orders over AUD$150, and Express Shipping starting at AUD$10.

Outside of the above shipping regions, we offer a flat rate shipping fee of AUD$25 for Standard Shipping, and AUD$40 for Express Shipping for all orders over AUD$150.

Shipping rates for orders under AUD$150 in value are calculated at checkout.
